Title: Return of the King
Plot: When Martin Luther King Jr. comes out of a coma after 32 years and finds himself thrust into the 21st and life in the post "September 11th" lunacy, his "turn the other cheek" philosophy quickly takes him from beloved national hero to dispised terrorist sympathizer.
GuestStars: Kevin Michael Richardson, Aaron McGruder, Jim Meskimen, Michele Morgan, DJ Pooh, Barry Sobel, Kym Whitley
